Hello, there. I’m Abdul Rahman, a final year Computer Engineering student from the National University of Singapore. I have a comprehensive knowledge in both computer architecture as well as software development. My current focus is on research and development of Machine Learning based applications.

Project Experiences

Data Science
Application of Reinforcement Learning in Weather Routing - Dissertation
Aug 2017 — Present

Optimize velocity of a vessel so as to reduce fuel consumption rate while meeting port schedules under harsh weather conditions using calculus of variation and Reinforcement learning approaches such as Q-learning.

Dance Tracker

Built an wearable device that tracks and predicts dance moves using machine learning and IoT sensors. CNN and LSTM algorithms were used to train the time-series data and was implemented with Keras TensorFlow framework.

Italian Hand Gesture Recognition

Built Image classification agorithms such as CNN, RNN to recognize Italian hand signs in python sci-kit learn and TensorFlow environments.

Mobile App Development
Dhikr & Dua

Dhikr & Dua is an Islamic supplication app built for the Android platform. It is built in Java with Firebase as backend and has advanced features like media playback and push notification service. It has gartnered more than 300,000 download since it's inception from around the world.

iBudget

iBudget is an iOS mobile application that aims to help consumers cut unnecessary spendings and save money. Users can set goals, plan their budget and record their purchases.

Software Development
TaskBook

TaskBook is a cross-platform desktop application built in Java with JavaFX for the user interface design. It is targeted to advance users who like to for quickly manage their tasks all with keyboard shotcuts without ever needing a mouse.

Embedded System Development
Caring for Aquatic Resources & Environments (CARE)

CARE is an embedded system that aims to monitor for pollutants, tresspassers and overgrowth of Algae in reservoirs. It has accelerometer, light sensor, Temperature sensor and ARM7 based LPC1769 micro-controller and is programmed in C language.
